title: Himi 325
lyrics:
7’s
1.
Ke tau fai loto taha,
Ke fakaongolelei;
‘A e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū,
‘I he’etau hiva ni,
Tau hiva le’o lahi,
Pea loto mālie,
‘O tauhi fiefia,
‘A e katoanga ‘ofa.
2.
Pea ke tau tokanga,
Ke tupu ‘etau ‘ofa,
Ke tatau mo e ‘ofa,
‘A e kau ma’ata;
Ko e kau loto to’a,
Pea ‘ofa ‘Otua,
‘O nau fa’a kātaki,
‘A e ngaahi mamahi.
3.
Pea kuo tau hoko,
Ki he ‘Eiki ko Sīsū,
Ke tau tui ke tau ma’u,
‘A hono Laumālie,
Pea ke tau fakahā,
‘A e ‘Eiki ko Sīsū,
Mo ‘ene fakahaofi,
‘A hotau laumālie.
4.
Ko ia ke tau hiva,
Hiva fakafetai,
‘I he ‘ofa ‘a Sīsū,
Ki hotau laumālie,
Pea ke tau fa’a fai,
Ke fetokoni’aki,
Pea tui ke tau hao,
‘O lava ki hēvani. *
